post:
NueaveHost are a new kind of host. Trying to provide a different experience for its customers anyway that we can. We start all our VPS plans at an affordable $5 for starter KVM VPS and $10 for fully licenced Windows VPS. All our VPS servers are fully customisable in our panel to suit your needs. If you buy annually you also save an automatic 30% of the total price. All our VPS servers have an NVME SSD Hard drive in so there's no slow speeds for anyone.


Get an extra 15% off using vps15 at checkout including annual payments making it 45% off a year.
Recurring promo code.
